docs.snippet: Jeter, the Yankees’ captain, has amassed many statistics in his long career, but one number that baseball has not kept track of is total swings....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeter, the Yankees’ captain, has amassed many statistics in his long career, but one number that baseball has not kept track of is total swings.
docs.abstract: Estimate of number of swings of the bat Derek Jeter has made over course of his career is around 341,144; questions arose when his New York Yankees teammates were reflecting on fact that Jeter will retire after current season, his 20th as a major leaguer.

headline.main: Derek Jeter Has 2,734 Games Played and 3,450 Hits. Swings? Here’s a Ballpark Guess.
headline.print_headline: 2,734 Games. 3,450 Hits. Swings? Here’s a Ballpark Guess.

docs.snippet: Flooding from days of heavy monsoon rains partially submerged the city of Srinigar in Kashmir and left more than 400 people dead in northern Pakistan and India. The flood waters have begun to recede, but vast fields of crops have been destroyed an...
docs.lead_paragraph: Flooding from days of heavy monsoon rains partially submerged the city of Srinigar in Kashmir and left more than 400 people dead in northern Pakistan and India. The flood waters have begun to recede, but vast fields of crops have been destroyed and tens of thousands of families have lost all their possessions.
